code: import axios from'axios';import{getUpcomingMovie}from'../redux/movieSlice';import{Upcoming_Movie,options}from'../utils/constant';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';const useUpcomingMovies=async()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();try{const res=await axios.get(Upcoming_Movie,options);dispatch(getUpcomingMovie(res.data.results));}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export default useUpcomingMovies;
